text: Moner Phool (Assamese: মনৰ ফুল) is a 2016 Indian Koch Rajbongshi language drama children's video film, written and directed by Robin Chandra Roy. Under banner of R C R production. The film stars Suman, Tikli, Bishal and Jublee. ==Cast== * Suman Roy as Suman * Tikli Roy as Suman's sister * Jublee Roy as Suman's sister * Bishal Roy as Student ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 short films Category:Indian short films Category:Films set in Assam Category:Indian films
title: Moner Phool
